!Chuta Kaimu: Mother Shilen, I implore you! Before my life ends in sorrow for my master's death, Before I am destroyed by the wrath of Sailren, Use me to restore order! Though I be shattered to pieces, use my energy to seal up our enemy! [Quest _126_IntheNameofEvilPart2 chutakaimu_q126_8.htm|The letters are reorganized.]
